subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The son of one of the notorious Hanson brothers from the movie “Slap Shot” scored his first N.H.L. goal, and Martin Gerber had 47 saves as the Toronto Maple Leafs beat the Devils.
snippet: The son of one of the notorious Hanson brothers from the movie “Slap Shot” scored his first N.H.L. goal, and Martin Gerber had 47 saves as the Toronto Maple Leafs beat the Devils.
